Hey there! I'm Luigi Robles (@UmbreonHugs) and I make websites, apps, and other cool stuff

About Me

  • I am a Front End Web Developer, and I love building things on the web!
  • I am self taught, and I have been doing web development for almost 6 years!
  • I am an enthusiast of a lot of things nerdy related! I am also a BIG pokemon fan!
  • I mainly do front end web development, such as HTML, CSS, Javascript (ES6), SASS, React.js, jQuery, Bootstrap 4, and Angular
  • I can do other things, such as PHP, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Docker, and Nginx
